name: Go Merge Fish! Terrarium Game
description:
Do you like fishing games? Go Merge Fish is an excellent game for both kids and adults. Beautiful art and animations create a unique gaming experience. Calming music and sounds will help you relax. After a while, new levels will be unlocked so you won't get bored.

Main game features:
- Match two similar paper stickers;
- Unlock new items;
- Evolve your Sea World;
- Unlock new Levels (cars, town, tropical etc.);
- Endless fun for all ages!

Enjoy and have fun! If you have any questions or suggestions feel free to reach us.
